paragraph.paragraph: This section of the documentation explains the References folder, located directly underneath an EiffelEnvision ../project.xmlProject node in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog.htmSolution Explorer, where it fits in and why EiffelEnvision projects have it.

references_folder.xml References Folder
Information on the EiffelEnvision project References folder.

context_menu.xml Reference Folder Context Menu
The context menu for the References folder.

item_context_menu.xml Reference Item Context Menu
The context menu for all component references under the References folder.
